titles.title: Davis-Bacon Modernization Act
To amend the Act of March 3, 1931 (known as the Davis-Bacon Act) to increase the contract amount specified in the Act.

bill.summary: 6/7/2001--Introduced. Davis-Bacon Modernization Act - Amends the Davis-Bacon Act to increase, from $2,000 to $100,000, the minimum contract amount required to trigger coverage under such Act (which requires that the locally prevailing wage rate be paid to various classes of laborers and mechanics working under federally-financed or federally-assisted contracts for construction, alteration, and repair of public buildings or public works).
